CmdLine: mkdir -p /opt &&     curl -SL https://sourceforge.net/projects/lportal/files/Liferay%20Portal/7.2.0%20GA1/liferay-ce-portal-tomcat-7.2.0-ga1-20190531153709761.tar.gz | tar -zxC /opt &&     ln -s /opt/liferay-portal-7.2.0-ga1 /opt/liferay-portal &&     ln -s /opt/liferay-portal/tomcat-9.0.17 /opt/liferay-portal/tomcat &&     chown -R 1000:1000 /opt/liferay-portal/*
